clear.description: Are you sure you want to clear the attachment to this question?
clear.title: Clear attachment

instruction.amount_double: 建议上传预期参赛队伍数量的两倍的动态附件。

dynamic.content: 批量上传动态附件，所有附件上传后将会以统一的文件名进行下发。
dynamic.format: 请以每个 flag 作为对应附件的文件名。

remote.content: 批量设置远程附件及对应 flag，每行一组。
remote.format: 请将 flag 字符串与 url 以空格隔开。

attachment_name.description: All dynamic attachments will be downloaded under this filename
attachment_name.label: Global Attachment Name

bonus.description: Triple Blood Bonus is a score prize that each team can receive when a topic has been removed from the first three teams. Tri-blood prizes are based on the current score of the issue and are added to the score of that team in a fixed percentage form.

challenges.delete: Are you sure you want to delete challenge {{name}}?
challenges.disable: Are you sure you want to disable challenge {{name}}?

empty.description: Click the top right to create the first problem
empty.title: Ouch! This game has no challenge yet.

challenges.enable: Are you sure you want to enable challenge {{name}}?

flag.create:
Create flag,multiple flag split by line, one per line.
can own multiple flags per topic, score any flag for each title.
flag.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this flag?

empty.description: Please add flag via top right corner
empty.title: The flag list is empty

instructions.both: If you need to enable leet flag with <1>[TEAM_HASH], add the <2>[LEET] tag before the flag template string. The entropy of the flag template string will not be checked.
instructions.description: Please enter flag template string, leave blank to generate random GUID as flag
instructions.guid: Specify <1>[GUID]</1> to replace only placeholder here with random GUID
instructions.leet: Leet String will be enabled if no <1>[TEAM_HASH]</1> is not specified and will change strings in parentheses based on the template, making sure that flag template string is sufficiently high
instructions.team_hash: If <1>[TEAM_HASH]</1> it will be automatically replaced with the hash generated by team token and match information

flag.title: flag management

allow_register.description: Allow users to register new accounts
allow_register.label: Allow new users to register

auto_active.description: Whether to auto-activate accounts after new users are registered
auto_active.label: Auto-activate after registration

email_confirmation_required.description: Whether user verification email is required
email_confirmation_required.label: Email verification required

email_domain_list.description: List of allowed email domains to register. Separate multiple domains with commas, leave empty without restriction
email_domain_list.label: Email domain whitelist

use_captcha.description: Whether to verify when logged in, register, and retrieving
use_captcha.label: Enable Captcha

auto_destroy.description: Whether to automatically destroy the old instance when the user opens the question instance but reaches the maximum limit
auto_destroy.label: Auto-destroy old instances
